name: BNNSLayerParametersLSTM
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a long short-term memory (LSTM) layer.

items.name: init(input_size: Int, hidden_size: Int, batch_size: Int, num_layers: Int, seq_len: Int, dropout: Float, lstm_flags: UInt32, sequence_descriptor: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, input_descriptor: BNNSLSTMDataDescriptor, output_descriptor: BNNSLSTMDataDescriptor, input_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor, forget_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor, candidate_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor, output_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor, hidden_activation: BNNSActivation)
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new long short-term memory (LSTM) parameters structure.

items.name: var input_size: Int
items.desc: The number of elements in the input.

items.name: var hidden_size: Int
items.desc: The number of elements in the hidden state.

items.name: var batch_size: Int
items.desc: The number of input and output samples.

items.name: var num_layers: Int
items.desc: The number of stacked long short-term memory (LSTM) layers.

items.name: var seq_len: Int
items.desc: The size of the sequential input.

items.name: var dropout: Float
items.desc: The dropout ratio to apply between long short-term memory (LSTM) layers.

items.name: var lstm_flags: UInt32
items.desc: Flags that control the behavior of a long short-term memory (LSTM) layer.

items.name: var sequence_descriptor: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: A 1D array of unsigned-integer elements that determines the batch size for each step.

items.name: var input_descriptor: BNNSLSTMDataDescriptor
items.desc: Descriptors of the input, hidden input, and cell-state input data.

items.name: var output_descriptor: BNNSLSTMDataDescriptor
items.desc: Descriptors of the output, hidden output, and cell-state output data.

items.name: var input_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the input gate, which uses default sigmoid activation.

items.name: var forget_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the forget gate, which uses default sigmoid activation.

items.name: var candidate_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the candidate gate, which uses default tanh activation.

items.name: var output_gate: BNNSLSTMGateDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the output gate, which uses default sigmoid activation.

items.name: var hidden_activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: Hidden activation function, which uses default tanh activation.
